page.title: 09LAW AND ORDER - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {THE POLICE}The police that work in North Tawton are community police. There are 2 of them and they drive around in panda cars.The police station is not run by men permanently. There are 2 houses near the station for the police and their families to live in.When there is a big accident more police come into the area. {FIRE}The fire men in North Tawton are ordinary men with ordinary jobs.They are volunteers who have volunteered to be fire men.They carry a bleeper with them every where they go.This is radio controlled from Exeter.The fire men then stop what ever they are doing and rush to the fire station. {AMBULANCE}In North Tawton we need to call ambulances out from Okehampton or Exeter.
